-1.title: Pedroso vs. Starks
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Dog Eat Dog World/Runaway Bedroom Set
1.plot: A Dog Eat Dog World; Runaway Bedroom Set - After a vicious pit bull attack kills her Yorkie, a woman sues for the cost of her dog and cremation fees; After furniture flies off a moving truck the customer seeks to be reimbursed.

2.title: Dodging Grandma/Horrible Neighbors
2.plot: Dodging Grandma; Horrible Neighbors - Grandma wants her money back after she purchased a car from her grandchildren's mother; In a surprise turn-around, the owners of a pit bull sue their neighbor's, saying the neighbors' retriever attacked their pit.

3.title: You Sold Me a Dead Woman's Car/A MMA Fight to Get My Money
3.plot: You Sold Me A Dead Woman's Car; MMA Fight To Get My Money - Car purchase gone bad when the buyer realizes the title belongs to a dead neighbor; Fans sue fighter after he refuses to finish paying for a decal cutter.

4.title: Harley Slam/Summer of 2013
4.plot: Harley Slam; Summer of 2013 - Motorcyclist was hit by truck and is suing for damages; Baby mama drama where accusations of harassment fly.

5.title: Irresponsible/Hit and Split
5.plot: Irresponsible; Hit and Split - Plaintiff says mother of his children asked for a loan for a car to drive their children and spent it on herself; Plaintiff says a man driving the Defendant's truck hit his building and took off.

6.title: Cell Phone Scam/Brooklyn Zoo
6.plot: Cell Phone Scam; Brooklyn Zoo - A man promising teens a cell phone investment disappears with the money; A couple sues for their deposit back from their overbearing landlady.

7.title: She's a Slumlord from Hell
7.plot: She's a Slumlord from Hell - Tenant accuses Defendant of being a slumlord after her ceiling caves in during a rainstorm flooding her mattress.

8.title: Caught on Video
8.plot: Caught on Video - Dispute between motorcycle and truck owners grows tense and potentially threatening.

9.title: Senior Trip Flip/Food Truck Fiasco
9.plot: Senior Trip Flip; Food Truck Fiasco - Best friends sue when graduating high school seniors' vacation gets booked in the wrong state; A chef's dream is destroyed when the food truck he bought turns into a kitchen nightmare.

10.title: A Drone and a Dogfight/She's Not Flying the Friendly Skies
10.plot: A Drone and a Dogfight; She's Not Flying the Friendly Skies - A fight between R/C helicopters escalates to the owners; Defendant claims his ex-girlfirend took advantage of him after their break up, but she claims he was harrassing her.

11.title: Bed Bug in a Bottle/The Ring Didn't Mean a Thing
11.plot: Bedbug in a Bottle; The Ring Didn't Mean A Thing - Woman sues for her deposit back after bedbug infestation in her San Francisco apartment; Couple says their credit is being destroyed after his cousin defaulted on a wedding ring they financed.

12.title: Penetrating Numbers/No Good Deed
12.plot: The Good Aunt - A woman wants repayment for a loan she gave to her aunt, but the aunt thinks her niece pocketed money that was supposed to be used to open IRA accounts.

13.title: Big Chef All Talk/30-Day Notice
13.plot: Hogging It All - A father and son dispute over the payment arrangement for a rental and over the sale of a family pig

14.title: Let the Music Play
14.plot: Let The Music Play - A DJ sues for unpaid gigs. The company owner is counter-suing, saying he was trying to steal business and missing gigs.

15.title: My Landlord Held Me Hostage/The Great Escape
15.plot: My Landlord Held Me Hostage - Landlords sue a single mother of seven for back rent. She says that he had a crush on her;

16.title: Sugar Daddy Shakedown/Hit the Bottle, Hit the Pole
16.plot: Sugar Daddy Shakedown; Hit the Bottle Hit the Pole - An elderly man claims a young woman took advantage of his generosity; A woman is sued after driving recklessly and knocking down a light pole in a residential area

17.title: First Stage Play/Bringing Down the House
17.plot: I Should Have Bought an Italian Scooter; Down on My Luck - A man buys a Chinese scooter, but finds out the scooter is illegal to ride in the US and wants his money back; A woman moves in and brings her whole family - the landlord says that wasn't the deal and wants payment for back rent and cleaning fees

18.title: Blurred Lines/Fender Bender Flip Flop
18.plot: Blurred Lines; Fender Bender Flip Flop - A senior citizen claims she hired the defendant as a gardner and he didn't deliver, but he says she had more flirtatious intentions; A man is rear-ended at a stop sign by a woman wearing flip-flops. She claims he wouldn't wait for the police report and now he is overcharging her

19.title: Odometer Setback
19.plot: Odometer Setback - Former high school friends are at odds over the odometer reading of the truck he sold her

20.title: Facebook Phone Feud/Thought You Had a Friend
20.plot: Facebook Phone Feud; Thought You Had A Friend - She lent money to her cousin, but he says he won't pay her because she defamed him on social media; A couple hired a man to build a cabinet but are demanding repayment for substandard work

21.title: Abandoned RV/Cruise Control
21.plot: Abandoned RV; Cruise Control - A man sues for the balance on an RV. The defendant says he can have it back; A woman's former college roommate skipped out on the rent and stuck her with the bill for a cruise they took together.

22.title: Owned Not Operated/Beauty & the Birdseed Bone Collector
22.plot: Owned Not Operated; Beauty and the Bones - A former couple sues a neighbor for damages on their car. The neighbor thinks they need to clean up their own issues; A chiropractor says former patient is crooked for not paying her bills. She says he violated her privacy

23.title: Florida or Bust/No Money More Problems
23.plot: Florida Or Bust; No Money More Problems - College students sue their former roommate for rent after he took off for Florida leaving them high and dry; A woman sues her former friend after he pocketed her social security payments.

24.title: Instaslam
24.plot: Insta-slam - Woman sues her former boyfriend claiming he smashed her car window with a golf club.

25.title: Crushed/Dream House Nightmare
25.plot: Crushed; Dreamhouse Nightmare - A young man sues his friend claiming her drug paraphernalia caused his car to be impounded and crushed; A woman spent over $300,000 to improve her Dream Home that she claims the defendant trashed.

26.title: Bait and Switch/Feuding Neighbors, Dueling Dogs
26.plot: Bait and Switch;Feuding Neighbors, Dueling Dogs - A man sues for the return of money after his friend did not give him what she promised; A woman sues her neighbor after her dog was injured in a dog fight.

27.title: Lock Your Phone or Live Alone/Friendship Doesn't Compute
27.plot: Lock Your Phone or Live Alone; Friendship Doesn't Compute - An ex-girlfriend wants money for the phone she bought her ex-boyfriend before they broke up; A woman claims her former friend refuses to return her computer, while her friend says it was a gift

28.title: Can't Play Me/Double Ended
28.plot: Can't Play Me; "Double-Ended" - A man sues his ex for numerous loans. She said he showered her with gifts to impress her; A woman sues a neighbor for hitting two vehicles in her driveway while driving under the influence.

29.title: High School Break-In
29.plot: High School Break-In - A woman sues a man claiming he owes for the value of items stolen from her home by his son and the boy's friends.

30.title: Daycare Dream/My First Accident
30.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

31.title: Cupcake Wars/Big Bear Small Crash
31.plot: Cupcake Wars; Big Bear, Small Crash - The owner of a cupcake shop wants her money back for an event that was cancelled due to a snowstorm; Two women got into an accident in a tourist town and each says the other is to blame

32.title: Jackass/That Dog-Gone Water Bill
32.plot: Jackass; That Dog-Gone Rental - A man's horse trailer is returned to him in bad condition and he wants the men responsible to pay for it; A landlord sues her former tenant over unpaid rent; the tenant says she was forced to euthanize her dog

33.title: Play No Pay/Left Behind Bumper
33.plot: Play No Pay; Left Behind Bumper - A musician sues for breach of contract when an event coordinator doesn't pay him for his performance; A bumper is left at the scene of an accident and the owner refuses to pay

34.title: Too Legit to Evict
34.plot: Too Legit to Evict - A tenant sues her former landlord over an illegal eviction - he says he was within his rights to evict her. Surprise accusations regarding race surface in this case.

35.title: Apartment Lies or Lust/Barking Up the Wrong Tree
35.plot: Hair Gone Wrong - A woman sues her stylist for making her hair fall out due to the product she used, but the stylist says it was an allergic reaction and unavoidable circumstances

36.title: To Hustle a Hustler/Strong-Armed
36.plot: To Hustle a Hustler; Strong-Armed - A man claims his friend sold him a lemon - his friend says he's a hustler just trying to get more money out of it; A man wants his money back for subpar work on his driveway

37.title: Over the Hedge/Gone to the Dogs
37.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

38.title: Rusty Whip/Condo Con
38.plot: Rusty Whip; Condo-Con - A man sues his mechanic for leaving his car out in the rain causing it to be ruined; Former tenants want their security deposit back, but the landlord says she fixed all the problems and they ruined the condo

39.title: Baby Boy Tenant/Look What I Can Do
39.plot: Baby Boy Tenant; Look What I Can Do - A landlord sues for back rent, but the tenant claims the building was in foreclosure and she illegally evicted him; An underage teenager bought a motorcycle and his dad wants the money back, but the seller says he isn't responsible for the plaintiff's bad parenting

40.title: Not Fast, But Furious/In-Law Feud
40.plot: Not Fast But Furious; In-Law Feud - Cousins battle over the legality of payments made on a car; Former inlaws dispute over money - she says it was a loan, he says it was a gift

41.title: Waterfall in the Bronx/The Shade Tree Mechanic
41.plot: Waterfall in the Bronx; The Shade Tree Mechanic - A landlord refuses to pay for damages caused by a pipe burst; Church acquaintances disagree about a car's condition - she wants him to pay and he says it's her problem now

42.title: Model Mayhem
42.plot: Playing Dirty; Motorcycle Mayhem - A tenant moves out without any notice and doesn't think she should pay due to poor conditions; the landlord wants his money back and even hired a private investigator to track her down; A man buys a bike off of Craigslist but isn't given the pink slip. He claims he was misled and wants his money back

43.title: Baby Mama Bang Up/No Bunnies Allowed
43.plot: Baby Mama Bang Up; No Bunnies Allowed - A pregnant woman sues for damage to her car done by her new boyfriend - he claims she's crazy and wants nothing to do with her; A landlord refuses to give a deposit back because the former tenant had a bunny in her room and ruined the carpet

44.title: Best Friend Betrayal
44.plot: Best Friend Betrayal - Former best friends and roommates argue over who was the better tenant

45.title: Who's Car Is It Anyway?/Sasha Fierce
45.plot: Who's Car is it Anyway?; Sasha Fierce - She wants the money he owes her for the car, but he says the car was towed and he shouldn't have to pay for a car he doesn't have; Both sides of a dog fight claim the other's canine is at fault

46.title: Living Free Off Me/Basket-Bull Tournament
46.plot: Substandard Living; Lights, Camera, Action - Two friends claim their landlord rented them a substandard house causing health issues, but the landlord says they never told him about the issues; A woman hired a photographer to take hair photos and create a calendar for her, but says she never received a finished product

47.title: Unlivable
47.plot: Unlivable - Former roommates are at odds over who made whom more uncomfortable in their co-living situation

48.title: Naughty Driving Behavior/Almighty Isis Took a Chunk Out of My Leg
48.plot: Naughty Driving Behavior; Almighty Isis - A woman lets her friend drive her car and he returns it damaged, but refuses to take responsibility; A man claims a dog bit him while he was walking his dogs at a dog park - the owner claims it's not possible because her dog is tame

49.title: Underage Impound
49.plot: Underage Impound - A woman sues for impound fees after her son's friend drives the company truck without a license

50.title: Family Loan Feud/Switch-A-Roo
50.plot: Family Loan Feud; Switch-A-Roo - A woman loans her nephew money and wants him to repay her - he says he doesn't owe because he helped her move; Former tenants want their deposit back on a house they vacated - the landlord says they violated the lease and he doesn't owe them anything

51.title: Gambling Grandma/To Your Left
51.plot: Gambling Grandma; To Your Left - A woman sues her mother for the balance of a utility bill left in her name - her mother says she didn't pay because she loves to gamble; Two people collide in an intersection and neither wants to admit fault due to illegal left turns

52.title: Bicycle Pitts Stop
52.plot: Bicycle Pitts Stop; Burning Down the House - A bicyclist claims he was hit when a man backed out of a parking space, but the driver says the bicycle hit him; A woman's car catches fire and causes damage to her landlord's house - the landlord wants payment since the woman was not insured for damages

53.title: 5 Months in Hell
53.plot: Ex friend and landlord dispute over back rent

54.title: Diva Stomp/Bumper Battles
54.plot: Diva Stomp; Bumper Battles - A recording artist sues for lost wages due to a foot injury inflicted by the defendant; A man wants a woman to pay for the damage she caused to his car, but she says he has been harassing her

55.title: Two Weeks' Notice/You Owe Me Now Pay
55.plot: Toilet Tantrums - Tenants sue their former landlord for the return of the security deposit, but the landlord claims they owe for a water bill and damage to the home

56.title: Smoke Shop Shenanigans/Full of Excuses
56.plot: Excuses, Excuses, Excuses - A handyman does not complete work on time, and has many reasons why he missed the deadline - the homeowner just wants her money back

57.title: Daddy's Girl
57.plot: Daddy's Girl - A man paid for the deposit on his daughter's apartment and wants it back - the landlord claims that she damaged the apartment and owes him for cleaning

58.title: Cruisin' for a Bruisin/Stop Snitching
58.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

59.title: Leaf Blowout/I Thought We Were Friends
59.plot: Leaf Blowout; I Thought We Were Friends - Gardeners blow dirt into a classic car, and now the owner of the car wants to be paid; A woman claims her "friend" sold her a car in poor condition; he says it was fine until she got a hold of it

60.title: Toilet Tantrums/Terror in the Dollhouse
60.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

61.title: Cancer Free/No Free Rent
61.plot: Cancer Free; No Free Rent - A party company did not deliver equipment as paid for to a 6 year-old's cancer-free celebration, and the mom wants her money back; A former landlord wants money for back rent, but the former tenant says she was allowed to stay rent-free

62.title: Comic Relief
62.plot: Comic Relief - Business and personal life get blurred in the life of a comedian, and now someone has to pay

63.title: Braking Bad/He's No Rhinestone Cowboy
63.plot: Transmission Fail - A man wants his transmission fixed, but it has taken the mechanic three times and it is still not fixed

64.title: Sweetheart Scandal/Motor Mischief
64.plot: Sweetheart Scandal; Motor Mischief - Former lovers are at odds over their relationship - both blame the other for the decline and want restitution; A woman wants repayment for car repairs since the mechanic has had it for a full year without fixing it.

65.title: Friendship Loan/Make-Up to Break Up
65.plot: Petty Theft - After a disagreement, a man is fired but claims he wasn't paid - the employer says his former employee stole from the company so he doesn't get a final check

66.title: Bicycle Pitts Stop/Friends or Roommates
66.plot: Ring Around the Roses; Friends or Roommates - A newly engaged couple is upset about the quality of an engagement ring, but the sellers say the buyers will not be satisfied with anything; A man says he had to evict his roommate due to non-payment of rent, but the evictee claims he held up his end of the bargain

67.title: Shady Surveillance
67.plot: Shady Surveillance - A man installed new security equipment for a business and wants to be paid - the business owner says the equipment was faulty and the owner would shut down the system

68.title: Motor City Madness/Old Grumpy Men
68.plot: Motor City Madness; Old Grumpy Men - Personal baby-mama drama leads to issues between landlord and tenant; A friendship goes sour and two elderly men get into a fist fight - each wants the other to pay up for the damages

69.title: Get Out
69.plot: Get Out - A landlord wants his former tenants to pay for damages, but the tenants say he is taking advantage

70.title: Repo, Eviction, and Destitute
70.plot: Repo, Eviction and Destitute - A woman claims her former lover did not take care of their bills like he said he would and she has lost everything because of it

71.title: A Kind Threat/Lover's Quarrell
71.plot: A Kind Threat; Lover's Quarre l- A landlord says his former tenant took advantage of his kindness and wants payment for back rent - the tenant says the place was uninhabitable; Former lovers disagree about who had the right to sell a car they bought together

72.title: Lipstick Lovers Shack Attack
72.plot: Lipstick Lovers Shack Attack - Friends became roommates, but one roommate did not pay her portion of the rent, and the others want her to pay

73.title: Not My Brother's Keeper/Get Out Tenant Get Out
73.plot: Tenant Tally-Up; And They Called it Puppy Love -An apartment manager loaned a former tenant money for rent - the tenant says he was coerced into taking the loan and doesn't owe a penny; Two men agree to trade cars and a few other items including a puppy. Neither are happy with the deal and both want repayment

74.title: Dead Woman's Goods/Car Crashed Credit
74.plot: Dead Woman's Goods; Car Crashed Credit - A woman was taking care of her late sister-in-law's belongings and was locked out by the landlord for taking too long; A man claims his credit is being ruined and wants the balance paid on his car loan after his friend defaulted on the payments

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: A father loans his estranged foster daughter his credit card and now she is refusing to pay him back; A woman claims she gave money to her best friend for rent and utilities but the bills weren't paid and now they've been evicted.

imdb.title: Judge Faith
plot: Faith Jenkins has gone from Louisiana beauty queen to work as a tough New York City prosecutor. Now she is the judge in her own courtroom, ruling on small claims cases from landlord-tenant disputes to social media scuffles.::Anonymous
